original_text: Jesus and his 12 disciples were coming near to Jerusalem. They came to the village called Bethphage. They were on the Mount of Olives. Then Jesus sent two of his disciples to go further.
korean_text: 그들이 예루살렘에 가까이 가서 감람 산 벳바게에 이르렀을 때에 예수께서 두 제자를 보내시며

sentences.original_text: Jesus and his 12 disciples were coming near to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님과 그의 제자 12명이 예루살렘에 가까이 오고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They came to the village called Bethphage
They were on the Mount of Olives
Then Jesus sent two of his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 그의 제자 중 두 사람을 보내셨습니다
